title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Picnicking in the Park
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Picnicking in the Park                Picnicking in the Park       Whether you need an area large enough for a family reunion or an intimate spot for two, you'll enjoy picnicking in the park. Picnic areas are scattered throughout Big South Fork NRRA; some provide grills, and all have tables. All picnic areas are first-come, first-served, with the exception of the shelters at Bandy Creek Campground.   Â       Picnic locations throughout the Big South Fork NRRA NPS
